cab.content: ' ':% y\A,N (This Document (s the Property of n gQJ, US^/ffl His Britannic Majesty^ Government.)BATTLE SITUATION * EVEHINQ - 13th MAY, 1918,1* There is no change in the general situation.2* An increase in artillery activity has "been noted on the 3rd Army front. This morning the enemy put down a heavy barrage on the left Brigade of the Division holding the sector opposite PUISIEDX^AtJ-MOKT. No infantry action ffol-lowed.3. An increase in tho number of Kite Balloons opposite the corps holding the sector FORET-DE*N1EPPE - METEREN has been observed. Hostile aerial activity has also beenconsiderable on this front.enoral Staff,War Office, S.W.1,13th May, 1918,Issued at 6 p.m*iZ f'\ ffi i \l! *-* ; 1,"J t vJ! . t
